Synopsis:
---------
World War II ( 1939-1945).After the Allied landing in Normandy, a group of American soldiers entrusted a dangerous mission: to salvage Private James Ryan. Men Patrol Captain John Miller must risk their lives to find this soldier, whose three brothers have been killed in the war.All that is known is that the soldier Ryan threw his squad parachute behind enemy lines.
